channel.title: How to make a private server
channel.description:
[b]I need some help making my own server.
When i tried making my own server using the Ultimate Server Guide i got about halfway and i couldnt figure it out. The part i have the most trouble with is the router part. And when i download a soure like test scape and sources like that i cant change anything like the client server.bat....
Can someone plz tell me a STEP BY STEP way to make a private server??? [/b]
